src:
Milošević: Dobro je da smo Mančester izbacili iz glave
„Sad možemo da stavimo fokus na realnije stvari“, poručuje strateg Parnog valjka

07 Nov 2019

Partizan se nije obrukao na Old Trafordu, ali nije ni uspeo da parira daleko kvalitetnijoj ekipi od sebe. Crveni đavoli su bez većih problema slavili sa ubedljivih 3:0, dok će Partizan u poslednja dva kola protiv AZ Alkmara i Astane pokušati da dođe do bodova koji će ga odvesti u 1/16 finala Lige Evrope.
Trener Partizana Savo Milošević poručuje da nema šta da zameri svojim igračima, iako misli da je mogla bolje da se suprotstavi ekipi Olea Gunara Solskjera."Kod mene nema razočaranja. Ovo su ipak druge brzine, jako je teško biti odgovoriti Mančester junajtedu. Nismo se najbolje snašli, dali smo sve od sebe, imali smo malo više grešaka nego što je smelo, prktično smo im poklonili dva gola, što se ne prašta na ovom nivou. Smirili smo ih prvih 20 minuta, što nam je i bila želja, ali nismo uspeli da održimo koncetracu. Veliko iskustvo za nas, da vidimo koji to fudbal morate da igrate ukoliko hoćete na vrh. Dobro je što smo izbacili Mančester junajted iz glave i sada možemo da se suočimo sa realnijim stvarima", poručio je Milošević za RTS.


OCENE – PARTIZAN: Takve greške Miletića i Uroševića se ne praštaju, Asano izgubljen u prostoru i vremenu, Pavlović će biti ozbiljan štoper


 
Crno-beli će pokušati da obezbede evropsko proleće u naredna dva evropska meča."Daćemo sve od sebe da osvojimo šest bodova, pa ćemo videti hoće li biti dovoljno za prolaz. Ono što je za nas važnije jeste prvenstvo, gde moramo biti bolji. Sada možemo da stavimo fokus na realnije stvari koje su daleko važnije za nas u ovom trenutku", poručio je Milošević.
Vezista Parnog valjka Saša Zdjelar imao je veliki broj teških duela sa snažnim vezistima Crvenih đavola."Znali smo da su kvalitetni, ušli smo dobro, ali smo se previše povukli. Koristili su svaku našu grešku, dva brza gola i posle toga je bilo teško da se vratimo u meč", rekao je Zdjelar.


Nismo isti (VIDEO)


Odbrana je imala dosta grešaka, ali protiv ovakvih protivnika neophodno da u odbrani gola učestvuje čitav tim."Tu je čitava ekipa, nema to veze sa odbranom, svih 11 igrača brane gol. Oni su pokazali da su izuzetni, čestitamo njima na pobedi, a mi idemo dalje", poručio je Zdjelar.
Partizan naredni meč u Ligi Evrope igra protiv AZ Alkmara u Hagu 28. novembra.
Foto: Reuters
text:
Milosevic: It's a good thing we got Manchester out of our heads
"We can now focus on more realistic things," says the Steam Roller strategist

07 Nov 2019

Partizan did not arm themselves at Old Traford, but did not manage to match a far better team than themselves. The Red Devils celebrated with a convincing 3-0 win, while Partizan will try to get points in the last two rounds against AZ Alkmaar and Astana, which will take him to the 1/16 finals of the Europa League.
Partizan coach Savo Milosevic says he has nothing to blame for his players, though he thinks she could better stand against Ole Gunar Solskjer's squad. "I have no disappointments. These are other speeds, it's very hard to answer Manchester United. we did our best, we had a few more mistakes than we should, we almost gave them two goals, which is not forgiven at this level. We calmed them down for the first 20 minutes, which was our wish, but we failed It is a great experience for us to see what kind of football you have to play if you want to get to the top. It is good that we have knocked Manchester United out of our heads and now we can face more realistic things, "Milosevic told RTS.


ASSESSMENT - PARTIZAN: Such mistakes by Miletic and Urosevic are not forgiven, Asano lost in space and time, Pavlovic will be a serious stopper



Black and whites will try to secure a European spring in the next two European matches. "We will do our best to score six points, so we will see if there will be enough to pass. What is more important to us is the championship, where we need to be better. Now we can focus on more realistic things that are far more important to us at the moment, "Milosevic said.
Steam Roller midfielder Sasha Zdjelar had a number of tough duels with strong Red Devils midfielders. "We knew they were good quality, we went in well, but we pulled back too much. They used our every mistake, two quick goals and after that it was hard to let’s get back into the match, ”Zdjelar said.


We are not the same (VIDEO)


The defense had a lot of mistakes, but against such opponents it is necessary for the whole team to participate in the goal defense. "The whole team is here, it has nothing to do with the defense, all 11 players defend the goal. They showed that they are exceptional, we congratulate them on their victory, and we are moving on, "said Zdjelar.
Partizan next match in the Europa League plays against AZ Alkmaar in The Hague on November 28th.
Photo by Reuters
